short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension was created to raise awareness of the negative effects of illegal OTT sites and prevent access to illegal OTT sites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension was created to raise awareness of the negative effects of illegal OTT sites and prevent access to illegal OTT sites. It also helps access normal OTT sites. We connected to Netflix, the most representative OTT site.
